modules.name: Remove Child Infected
modules.description: Removes child-like visuals from all biters, virals, and banshees in the world

modules.name: WarZones
modules.description: The city is called to arms during the day to reclaim their territories. All human enemies will run in packs around the city. This is not compatible with Volatiles Begone or Infestation

modules.name: Infestation
modules.description: The city no longer is safe during the day. The infected no longer suffer from the sunlight and will stop at nothing to kill you. This module is not compatible with Warzones or Volatiles Begone

modules.name: Volatiles Be Gone
modules.description: Tired of getting slaughtered by the Volatiles at night? Now you can roam free using the Casual Survivor spawn settings but without Volatiles. This is not compatible with Warzones or Infestation

modules.name: Remove Weapon Mod Visuals
modules.description: Want to get rid of those attachments on your weapons that ruin your sense of immersion? Toggle on this module to enjoy the game without the cluttered weapon appearances

modules.name: Deadly Humans
modules.description: Tired of humans being the least scary thing on the map? Active this module and fear the living

modules.name: Stash Unlock
modules.description: PARTS OF THIS MOD ARE BROKEN DUE TO OFFICIAL UPDATES: Unlocks the stash items for IALR, not recommended for new players.

modules.name: Levels Be Gone
modules.description: This flattens the RPG Level tiers to use a single health and single damage value for all weapons and enemies. This will help reduce the scaling challenges in the base game for some weapons. Feedback is appreciated.

modules.name: Physics Overhaul
modules.description: New changes to the physics system to be primarily Ragdoll based physics like DL1. This does have some bugs and can cause lag, open data3 and delete physics folder if your PC slows down
